snippets.name: For Loop
snippets.content:
for item in "${items[@]}"; do
    echo "$item"
done

snippets.name: For Loop (range)
snippets.content:
for i in {1..10}; do
    echo "$i"
done

snippets.name: For Loop (C-style)
snippets.content:
for ((i = 0; i < n; i++)); do
    echo "$i"
done

snippets.name: While Read Lines
snippets.content:
while IFS= read -r line; do
    echo "$line"
done < "$filename"

snippets.name: Function
If/Else
snippets.content:
if [ condition ]; then
    
elif [ other_condition ]; then
    
else
    
fi

snippets.name: If String
snippets.content:
if [ -z "$var" ]; then
    echo "Empty"
fi

if [ -n "$var" ]; then
    echo "Not empty"
fi

if [ "$a" = "$b" ]; then
    echo "Equal"
fi

snippets.name: Array
snippets.content:
arr=("item1" "item2" "item3")
echo "${arr[0]}"       # First element
echo "${arr[@]}"       # All elements
echo "${#arr[@]}"      # Length

snippets.name: Script Parameters
snippets.content:
# $0 = script name
# $1, $2 = arguments
# $# = number of arguments
# $@ = all arguments

if [ $# -lt 1 ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <arg>"
    exit 1
fi

snippets.name: Redirection
snippets.content:
command > output.txt      # Overwrite
command >> output.txt     # Append
command 2>&1              # Stderr to stdout
command &> output.txt     # Both to file

snippets.name: Trap
Check Command Exists
snippets.content:
if ! command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
    echo "docker not found"
    exit 1
fi
